body: Great ending for the fmc. It could've ended with a polygamy but this shows how the character's growth really shines.

Glad it's actually a proper bittersweet ending. After both sisters acknowledged that all three of them staying together would never work out, there's no way it could've kept going outside of dumb Hentai Logic™.
Just read your summary Drink, so this is the end afterall huh, it was a good ride while it lasted.
Last chapter sumnary for this series: https://pastebin.com/wvksCLDK
